title: kingdoms of amalur reckoning
description:
Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning

Year: February 7, 2012
Genre: RPG / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Big Huge Games / 38 Studios
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Language: English / Russian
Language: English
Publication Type: RePack
Crack: enclosing (Prophet) 

System requirements:

    System: Microsoft Windows Vista / Seven / Eight
    Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 Ghz
    Memory: 1 Gb
    Video card: 512 Mb, Shader Model 3.0, c support for DirectX 9.0c
    Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
    Hard Drive: 9 Gb 


Description:

Reckoning - this dynamic battle in the third person, the study of the game world, thoughtful system of creation and development of character and action-story set in the fantasy universe of detailed. Adventure begins with the protagonist miraculous resurrection: it turns out that he owns a very dangerous and unfathomable magic, able to change once and for all Amalur. Caught in the middle of a fierce confrontation more races, factions and alliances, elected shall disclose the secret of his immortality and put an end to the ancient evil that threatens the world.
Chronicles kingdoms Amalura describe ten thousand years. In the game Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning is recreated only a fragment of the epic story, born pen famous writer Robert Salvatore - the life of a hero, but such is destined to determine the fate of the entire universe.
Every building, tree and living thing in the universe Kingdoms of Amalur is unique and is part of a whole: the marvelous landscapes, wonderful city, colorful characters and fantastic creatures - all this is done in a recognizable manner famous artist Todd McFarlane.
